demolition

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.GameObject
      • demolition.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Red, Yellow

    public abstract class Enemy
extends GameObject

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      protected demolition.Direction current_dir

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reset()
      Resets the position of the enemy, and aligns the enemy's FPS timer (how many frames until the next second) with the map's FPS timer such that the enemies continue to move only at the start of every second
      void tick()
      To be executed once every frame, calls GameObject.sprite_cycle() to cycle the sprite in the array and calls GameObject.move(Direction d) once every 60 frames

      • Methods inherited from class demolition.GameObject

        checkCollision, collisionCondition, draw, getI, getJ, getOriginalI, getOriginalJ, getOriginalX, getOriginalY, getX, getY, move, resetPos, sprite_cycle

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • current_dir

        protected demolition.Direction current_dir

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(int x,
             int y,
             int i_pos,
             int j_pos,
             processing.core.PImage[][] sprites,
             Map map)
        Constructor for an Enemy
        Parameters:
        x - x position of the Enemy, amount of pixels to the right (for drawing)
        y - y position of the Enemy, amount of pixels downwards (for drawing)
        i_pos - the row within the map array where Enemy is located
        j_pos - the column within the map array where Enemy is located
        sprites - the sprite array, with each row corresponding to a sprite array for different movement directions
        map - the map object that the Enemy is placed within

    • Method Detail

      • tick

        public void tick()
        To be executed once every frame, calls GameObject.sprite_cycle() to cycle the sprite in the array and calls GameObject.move(Direction d) once every 60 frames
        Specified by:
        tick in class GameObject

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the position of the enemy, and aligns the enemy's FPS timer (how many frames until the next second) with the map's FPS timer such that the enemies continue to move only at the start of every second
        Specified by:
        reset in class GameObject
